name: Meatloaf With Cheddar Cheese
keywords: cheddar, ground sirloin, red bell pepper, main course, nut-free
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 pounds ground beef (round or sirloin), broken into pieces
1 large sweet red pepper, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, beat the egg lightly. Add the salt, pepper, garlic powder, rosemary, parsley, mustard, ketchup and bouillon and mix until well blended. Add the celery, onion and cheese and mix again. Add the ground beef, red pepper and bread crumbs and mix thoroughly.

Shape the mixture into a loaf approximately 14 inches long and 3 inches high. Slide the loaf onto a jellyroll pan and bake for 1 hour to 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until brown and a crust forms on the outside.
Remove from the oven and cut into thick slices.
